channel.title: To start up my server how do i
channel.description:
How do i configure my ip i have a dynamic ip it changes a couple times a day.
Also if someone wants to host for me email me at gb_carlos@live.com. I made a nice source and client.
I will make you co-owner.

item.title: To start up my server how do i
item.dc:creator: @ccuartas3 ccuartas3
item.description:
@ccuartas3 wrote:

ok and do i have to put the ip in the source or jsut run the source and run the no-ip. Also which ip do i use the numbers or the ex: non existing server.no-ip.org or w.e for people to get in the server becuz if i use ip it changes lol so idk just leave a comment

Also if someone wants to host for me email me at gb_carlos@live.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2009, 11:41:00 am[/size][hr]Can anyone help? stil trying

Read full topic
item.source: To start up my server how do i

item.title: To start up my server how do i
item.dc:creator: @Master_Chef Master Chef
item.description:
@Master_Chef wrote:

No it will not effect players online. It simply updates the IP to your current one. If you are in a crowded area with many routers find the one you are going to host from and then select ‘Automatically start up with this Connection.’

Read full topic

item.title: To start up my server how do i
item.dc:creator: @Kyle_Dibiase Kyle_Dibiase
item.description:
@Kyle_Dibiase wrote:

just use a no-ip, and when ure ip changes, update ure ip-adress in the no-ip manage hosts area
